org.apache.beam.runners.spark.translation.streaming

Class StreamingEvaluationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.runners.spark.translation.EvaluationContext
      • org.apache.beam.runners.spark.translation.streaming.StreamingEvaluationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EvaluationResult, PipelineResult

    public class StreamingEvaluationContext
extends EvaluationContext
    Streaming evaluation context helps to handle streaming.

      • computeOutputs

        public void computeOutputs()
        Description copied from class: EvaluationContext
        Computes the outputs for all RDDs that are leaves in the DAG and do not have any actions (like saving to a file) registered on them (i.e. they are performed for side effects).
        Overrides:
        computeOutputs in class EvaluationContext
